thread.title: Amit Mishra wasn't in the room during alleged assault?
thread.title_full: Amit Mishra wasn't in the room during alleged assault? - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Amit Mishra wasn't in the room during alleged assault?
text: According to leading TV channel, Amit Mishra wasn't in the hotel room at the time the woman claimed to be have been assaulted by him, a source close to the cricketer said. The source told ABP News: "She is not his girlfriend. He (Amit Mishra) didn't even know that she was in his room. She picked up the access card from the hotel ... Â»
